long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Odoo UCP Grade Calculate is a powerful extension designed to provide students with real-time access to their current grades for any course. It not only helps students calculate their grades before the final results are determined but also estimates their GPA and CGPA based on their course grades.

Key Features of UCP Grade Calculate (Version 1.0.1):

âœ” Presentation of the overall total marks and percentage achieved for any given course.
âœ” Class average display for each course.
âœ” Real-time display of the current grade for each course.
âœ” Visual representation of grades using different colors to facilitate easy understanding.

New Features in (Version 2.0.1):

âœ” Real-time estimation of GPA based on course grades.
âœ” Estimation of CGPA based on the estimated GPA.
âœ” Display of total completed credit hours.
âœ” Display of remaining credit hours for the student's degree.
âœ” Ability to enter the student's total degree credit hours in the extension popup.
âœ” Option to enable/disable dark mode for the Odoo student portal within the extension popup.
âœ” Option to enable/disable the extension within the extension popup.


New Features in (Version 2.1.0):
âœ” Best of selection option for all assessment type


Using the extension is straightforward:
1. Install the Odoo UCP Grade Calculate extension.
2. Open the " Odoo UCP Student portal" .
3. Navigate to the desired course to calculate the grade.

To calculate the GPA and CGPA:
1. Check the grades of all courses to estimate the GPA.
2. The extension will provide real-time estimation of the GPA and CGPA based on the course grades.
